dict.acceptation: 囚犯；犯人；俘虏；刑事被告；

sent.orig: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
sent.trans: 宽恕是让一个囚犯得到自由，而这囚犯就是你自己。

sent.orig: The enemy took him prisoner/He was taken prisoner by the enemy.
sent.trans: 敌人把他俘虏了[他被敌人俘虏]。

sent.orig: To forgive is to set a prisoner and discover the prisoner was YOU.
sent.trans: 饶恕就是开释囚犯，之后知囚犯便是你本身。

sent.orig: And they had then a notable prisoner, called Barabbas.
sent.trans: 当时，有一个出名的囚犯叫巴拉巴。

sent.orig: The jury convicted the prisoner of murder.
sent.trans: 陪审团宣告这犯人犯谋杀罪。
